content.responsible: ID Finance Investments S.L.U., with CIF B66862442 and address at Calle Tuset, 5, 3rd floor, 08006 Barcelona (Spain), is responsible for the processing of personal data collected on the platform.
content.purposes: Personal data is collected to manage platform access, record participation and progress in training, handle support requests, send training-related communications, and comply with legal obligations and internal compliance. Processing is based on the execution of the contractual relationship and the legitimate interest in training and raising awareness among the team regarding data protection.
content.data: We collect identifying data (corporate email), data related to training use (progress, responses and results in modules and activities), and technical access data (logs, IP addresses and cookies strictly necessary for the secure operation of the platform).
content.legalBasis: The legal basis for data processing is the execution of the professional relationship and compliance with legal obligations related to data protection training. In some cases, it may also be based on the company's legitimate interest.
content.retention: Data will be retained for as long as necessary for the established purposes or during the period required by current regulations, and will be deleted or anonymized following secure protocols.
content.recipients: Data will not be communicated to third parties except by legal obligation. In certain cases, data may be processed by essential technology providers (such as Supabase for backend and authentication). No international transfers are made outside the European Economic Area.
content.cookies: The platform uses only technical and preference cookies strictly necessary to ensure proper operation and personalize the user experience. Technical cookies to manage user authentication session, based on corporate email. Preference cookies to store language selection. No third-party cookies, analytics cookies or advertising cookies are used.
content.rights: You can request at any time access, rectification, deletion, limitation, opposition and portability of your data by sending a detailed request to dpd@idfinance.com, indicating your identity and the right you wish to exercise. You have the right to file a complaint with the Spanish Data Protection Agency if you consider that your rights have not been properly addressed.
content.security: Appropriate technical and organizational measures are applied to ensure the confidentiality, integrity and availability of data, including access controls, encryption and periodic audits.
content.modifications: ID Finance reserves the right to modify this policy to adapt it to regulatory or technical changes, notifying relevant updates through the platform.

cookies.description: Transparent information about cookie usage on our training platform.

content.whatAreCookies:
Cookies are small text files that are stored on your device when you visit a website. These files allow the website to recognize your device and remember information about your visit.

At RgpdEducation, we use cookies responsibly and transparently, complying with all applicable data protection regulations.
content.technicalCookies:
Technical cookies are strictly necessary for the platform to function. These cookies:

• Manage user authentication sessions through their corporate email
• Allow secure access to platform services
• Guarantee basic system functionality
• Are essential for data security

Without these cookies, the platform could not function properly.
content.preferenceCookies:
Preference cookies store your choices to improve your experience:

• Save your language selection (Spanish, English or Russian)
• Maintain your display preferences
• Personalize your browsing experience

These cookies help us offer you a more comfortable experience tailored to your needs.
content.whatWeDontUse:
At RgpdEducation we DO NOT use:

❌ Third-party cookies
❌ Analytics or tracking cookies
❌ Advertising cookies
❌ Social media cookies
❌ Profiling cookies

Your privacy is our priority. We do not share information with third parties nor track your activity outside our platform.
content.cookieManagement:
You can manage cookies from your browser settings:

• Chrome: Settings > Privacy and security > Cookies
• Firefox: Options > Privacy and security
• Safari: Preferences > Privacy
• Edge: Settings > Cookies and permissions

Please note that disabling technical cookies may affect platform functionality.
content.policyUpdates:
This cookie policy is reviewed periodically to ensure continued regulatory compliance.

Any significant changes will be notified through the platform and the last modification date will be updated.

If you have questions about our cookie policy, contact our data protection team.
